pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, December 10, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Mexico City, Mexico

12:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will participate in a trilateral meeting and signing ceremony with United States Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer and Mexico’s Undersecretary for North America Jesús Seade.

Palacio Nacional

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Please contact Sacha.Levasseur-Rivard@international.gc.ca in advance to obtain accreditation.
  • Media are asked to present themselves to the Palacio Nacional no later than 11:00 a.m.

4:30 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will participate in a press conference.

Embassy of Canada in Mexico

Notes for media:

  • A livestream will be shared on the Embassy of Canada in Mexico Facebook page at this link: https://bit.ly/2RFeGXG
  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Please contact Sacha.Levasseur-Rivard@international.gc.ca in advance to obtain accreditation.
